body_html: @ozancaglayan this will break if you try to use it with DataParallel. We should just get a ModuleDict, but as a workaround, you can keep a module list, and make the dict map names to indices in that list (this will work with DataParallel)
body_text: @ozancaglayan this will break if you try to use it with DataParallel. We should just get a ModuleDict, but as a workaround, you can keep a module list, and make the dict map names to indices in that list (this will work with DataParallel)
body: @ozancaglayan this will break if you try to use it with `DataParallel`. We should just get a `ModuleDict`, but as a workaround, you can keep a module list, and make the dict map names to indices in that list (this will work with `DataParallel`)
